episodes.synopsis: The area around the Arctic Circle is one the of the greatest wilderness areas. We film an entire year in the Arctic where life depends on the seasons.
episodes.title: Arctic Ocean: The Frozen Sea

episodes.synopsis: Follow a year in the life of animals, such as the brown bear, that have adapted to the freezing Taiga, which contains one-third of the world's trees.
episodes.title: Taiga: The Frozen Forests

episodes.synopsis: The Arctic tundra covers one-fifth of the earth's surface and belongs to the coldest and most arid areas on the planet, but there is life nonetheless.
episodes.title: Tundra: Desert of Ice

episodes.synopsis: Discover Iceland's beauty and meet the wild animals of this unique area, from the Arctic fox to the largest colony of puffins in the world.
episodes.title: Iceland: Land of Fire & Ice

video.title: Wildest Arctic
video.synopsis: This four-part series travels to the Taiga and shows the forests sheltering animals that specialize in dealing with the ice and cold.
